body_html:
I am guessing what you want to do
is to compile tensorflow from sources in Windows....Follow the below links:
https://joe-antognini.github.io/machine-learning/build-windows-tf
https://github.com/cjweeks/tensorflow-cmake
https://medium.com/@shiweili/building-tensorflow-c-shared-library-on-windows-e79c90e23e6e

If I am guessing wrong, please correct me..!!

body:
I am guessing what you want to do 
is to compile tensorflow from sources in Windows....Follow the below links:
https://joe-antognini.github.io/machine-learning/build-windows-tf
https://github.com/cjweeks/tensorflow-cmake
https://medium.com/@shiweili/building-tensorflow-c-shared-library-on-windows-e79c90e23e6e
